content_security_policy.extension_page: default-src 'self' blob: data:; img-src 'self' * blob: data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob: data:; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' 'inline-speculation-rules' 'unsafe-inline' http: blob: data:; worker-src 'self' blob:* data:*;
content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' 'inline-speculation-rules' 'unsafe-inline' http: blob: data:; worker-src 'self' blob:* data:*;; child-src 'self';
